Room.Name: Rosecrest Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Rosecrest Street, north of the Cetacean Bridge.
Room.LongDescription: Rosecrest continues to the north and south from here, eventually running past the main entrance to Lyanden Castle about three blocks to the north. On to the south, you can see the Cetacean Bridge which crosses over the Lithium Inlet, leading out to the Nylandian Bay.
